Translations.Text: fala tuʿ'jib'ka amwaluhum wala awladuhum innama yuridu l-lahu liyuʿadhibahum biha fi l-hayati l-dun'ya watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kafiruna
wayahlifuna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wama hum minkum walakinnahum qawmun yafraquna
law yajiduna malja-an aw magharatin aw muddakhalan lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmahuna
wamin'hum man yalmizuka fi l-sadaqati fa-in uʿ'tu min'ha radu wa-in lam yuʿ'taw min'ha idha hum yaskhatuna
walaw annahum radu ma atahumu l-lahu warasuluhu waqalu hasbuna l-lahu sayu'tina l-lahu min fadlihi warasuluhu inna ila l-lahi raghibuna

innama l-sadaqatu lil'fuqarai wal-masakini wal-ʿamilina ʿalayha wal-mu-alafati qulubuhum wafi l-riqabi wal-gharimina wafi sabili l-lahi wa-ib'ni l-sabili faridatan mina l-lahi wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun

wamin'humu alladhina yu'dhuna l-nabiya wayaquluna huwa udhunun qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu'minu bil-lahi wayu'minu lil'mu'minina warahmatun lilladhina amanu minkum wa-alladhina yu'dhuna rasula l-lahi lahum ʿadhabun alimun
